title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu in build 20020508 with the latest UI code, not all the opened editors are being closed.
EB: It should close all the opened editors that have not been modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open multiple editors in the application.
2. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt).
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
